ComicInfo.Summary:
Kid Colt stumbles onto the Robin Hood Raider stealing from Ned Delman's ranch and helps his daughter Susan catch the Raider.
When Clem is gunned down in a saloon Kid Colt tries to determine what really happened.
ComicInfo.Title: The Robin Hood Raider!; Showdown at the Silver Spur!; Targo
ComicInfo.Writer: Dennis O'Neil,Gary Friedrich,Ron Whyte,Denny O'Neil,Ron Whyte,Gary Friedrich,Denny O'Neil
